bug.short_desc: bolzplatz2006-1.0.3-32.fc24: FTBFS in Fedora Rawhide on arm
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Package bolzplatz2006 fails to build from source in Fedora Rawhide only on ARM.
[exec] gcc -shared -Wall -o liblwjgl.so org_lwjgl_opengl_LinuxAWTGLCanvasPeerInfo.o org_lwjgl_opengl_Pbuffer.o org_lwjgl_opengl_LinuxPeerInfo.o display.o extgl_glx.o org_lwjgl_input_Cursor.o org_lwjgl_opengl_LinuxContextImplementation.o org_lwjgl_input_Mouse.o context.o org_lwjgl_opengl_LinuxCanvasImplementation.o org_lwjgl_input_Keyboard.o org_lwjgl_opengl_Display.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL11.o ../common/org_lwjgl_openal_AL10.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL20.o ../common/extgl.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GLContext.o ../common/extal.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_AWTSurfaceLock.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL14.o ../common/common_tools.o ../common/org_lwjgl_openal_ALC.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL13.o ../common/org_lwjgl_openal_AL.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL12.o ../common/org_lwjgl_opengl_GL15.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBTextureCompression.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBOcclusionQuery.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBImaging.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBColorBufferFloat.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBDrawBuffers.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBWindowPos.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBVertexBlend.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBPointParameters.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBBufferObject.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBVertexProgram.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBVertexShader.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBMatrixPalette.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBTransposeMatrix.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBMultitexture.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBProgram.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBMultisample.o ../common/arb/org_lwjgl_opengl_ARBShaderObjects.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIVertexAttribArrayObject.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATISeparateStencil.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIVertexArrayObject.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIEnvmapBumpmap.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIPnTriangles.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIMapObjectBuffer.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIVertexStreams.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIFragmentShader.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIDrawBuffers.o ../common/ati/org_lwjgl_opengl_ATIElementArray.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTVertexShader.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTBlendFuncSeparate.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTFogCoord.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTStencilTwoSide.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTFramebufferObject.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTCompiledVertexArray.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTDrawRangeElements.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTBlendEquationSeparate.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTSecondaryColor.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTVertexWeighting.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTMultiDrawArrays.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTPointParameters.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTDepthBoundsTest.o ../common/ext/org_lwjgl_opengl_EXTPalettedTexture.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVHalfFloat.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVVertexArrayRange.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVPointSprite.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVOcclusionQuery.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVPrimitiveRestart.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVRegisterCombiners.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVEvaluators.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVVertexProgram.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVPixelDataRange.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVRegisterCombiners2.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVProgram.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVFence.o ../common/nv/org_lwjgl_opengl_NVFragmentProgram.o ../common/ov/org_lwjgl_audio_vorbis_Util.o ../common/ov/ov_callback_mem.o ../common/ov/ov_al_helper.o ../common/ov/org_lwjgl_audio_vorbis_DataStream.o -lX11 -lXext -lpthread -L/usr/lib/jvm/java-openjdk/jre/lib/arm -ljawt -lvorbisfile -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lXrender -lXrandr [exec] /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -ljawt [exec] collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status [exec] make: *** [Makefile:14: liblwjgl.so] Error 1
Steps to Reproduce: koji build --scratch f26 bolzplatz2006-1.0.3-32.fc24.src.rpm
Additional info: This package is tracked by Koschei. See: http://apps.fedoraproject.org/koschei/package/bolzplatz2006
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
This has been fixed now (since bolzplatz2006-1.0.3-34.fc26), closing.
